snippet: A 3 percent increase by Intel after it posted strong earnings drove up shares of technology companies, which, with industrials, accounted for much of the day’s gains.
abstract: Stocks rise on a new sign of recovery in the housing market and strong corporate earnings.
lead_paragraph: A 3 percent increase by Intel after it posted strong earnings drove up shares of technology companies, which, with industrials, accounted for much of the day’s gains.

headline.seo: Markets Rise on Good News for Housing and Earnings
headline.main: Indexes Rise on Good News For Housing and Earnings
headline.print_headline: Indexes Rise on Good News For Housing and Earnings
